#USER# Mom packed my lunch almost every day from 1st grade through graduation. Baloney on white bread sandwich & potato chips every day because it was cheaper than the cost of a school lunch which at the time was 35 cents a day. If I was lucky she cooked a hotdog & put it in the thermos
